arts.ttl: Honest Mark Robins makes 'prerequisite' demand of Stoke City players
arts.sum: Mark Robins had sympathy for Stoke City’s travelling fans as he demands his players stand up to be counted. They will say they've played a great pass in behind our full-back which is a terrible, terrible bit of positioning, no communication, a lack of awareness.

arts.ttl: Stoke City head of recruitment leaving after just half-a-season
arts.sum: Dublin joined in 2023 but left last spring. Lee Darnbrough is leaving Stoke City after just half-a-season as head of recruitment.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Stoke as Mehmeti double secures 2-0 win
arts.sum: A shaky moment in the first half shouldn't take away from a good performance from Bristol City's number one. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Stoke City suffer fresh injury blow to key man to cap defeat at Bristol City
arts.sum: "We're trying to get players in positions that you know they're capable of doing it but Lewis Koumas, who has just scored two goals against Cardiff on Saturday, picked up some sort of bug and missed training. "It's too simplistic to say we've got to move on from this one quickly because we've got a game in 48 hours but we're going to have to pick the bones out of it and come up with a game plan for Saturday that was better than this one - but the players have got to help with that.

arts.ttl: Stoke player ratings vs Bristol City as ironic cheers rub in miserable night
arts.sum: Stoke looked vulnerable defensively but so did the hosts and Baker had a good sight at goal just after the half-hour mark when Wilson-Esbrand cut back a cross for the midfielder to hit on the bounce, but steer it narrowly wide. Yu Hirakawa had time and space in the box to fire on target and Johansson had to fling himself to his right to push away – and he stopped from the same player moments later after Stoke had lost possession too easily on a counter attack.

arts.ttl: Anis Mehmeti’s double gives play-off chasing Bristol City win over Stoke
arts.sum: Stoke remain just three points clear of the relegation zone.

arts.ttl: Stoke City team news vs Bristol City as Mark Robins makes tweaks
arts.sum: Jordan Thompson makes his return to the squad on the bench after a hernia operation while Junior Tchamadeu, Lewis Koumas, Bae Junho, Emre Tezgel, Jack Bonham and Andre Vidigal are also among the subs from the team that started against Cardiff, as well as Ben Pearson and Bosun Lawal. Stoke: Johansson, Phillips, Rose, Gibson, Wilson-Esbrand, Burger, Seko, Moran, Baker, Lowe, Al-Hamadi.

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Stoke City as Robins look to bounce back from Swansea defeat
arts.sum: After such a quick turnaround from Sunday's game and with a Severnside derby clash against Cardiff City on the horizon on Saturday, the City head coach will have to manage his squad carefully over the coming days. Although Brian Tinnion told BBC Radio Bristol that Cam Pring was set to return to first-team training on Monday, Liam Manning had insisted last week that tonight's clash with Stoke and the weekend's Severnside derby against Cardiff City would come too soon for him to make his Bristol City return.
